Title: AKA 99 Friends
Writer: Brian Bendis (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Michael Gaydos (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Melissa Rosenberg (created by), Hilly Hicks Jr.
Actors: Krysten Ritter, Rachael Taylor, Wil Traval, Eka Darville
Plot: A new case demands attention as Jessica tries to find out who's spying on her for Kilgrave. Trish's radio show yields unexpected consequences.
